title: Strategies to address key challenges of metallacycle/metallacage-based supramolecular coordination complexes in biomedical applications
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,3167-3204
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00926B, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Dongdong Xu, Yang Li, Shouchun Yin, Feihe Huang
We report strategies employed by metallacycle/metallacage-based supramolecular coordination complexes to enhance water solubility and biostability and reduce potential toxicity and side effects for biomedical applications.
